steps: Go to "Page 1 Sign Up"
Fill in valid name, email, and password
Click on "Create an account" button
expectedResult: Should see a confirmation message, receive a verification email, and be redirected to the login/home page

testCase: Account Creation Failure - Invalid Email Format
steps: Go to "Page 1 Sign Up"
Fill in valid name, invalid email format (e.g., missing '@' symbol), and password
Click on "Create an account" button
expectedResult: Should see an error message indicating invalid email format

steps: Go to "Page 1 Sign Up"
Fill in valid name, existing email (e.g., already registered), and password
Click on "Create an account" button
expectedResult: Should see an error message indicating that the email address is already taken

steps: Go to "Page 2 Log In"
Fill in valid email and password
Check "Remember me" box
Click on "Login" button
expectedResult: Should see the homepage, and the browser should remember the login credentials for future sessions

steps: Go to "Page 2 Log In"
Fill in valid email and password
Leave "Remember me" box unchecked
Click on "Login" button
expectedResult: Should see the homepage, but the browser should not remember the login credentials for future sessions

steps: Go to "Page 2 Log In"
Fill in invalid email or password (e.g., wrong credentials)
Click on "Login" button
expectedResult: Should see an error message indicating invalid credentials

steps: Go to the homepage ("Page 3 E-Commerce HomePage")
Enter a valid keyword (e.g., "shoes") in the search bar
Press Enter or click on the magnifying glass icon
expectedResult: Should see relevant products with images, names, and prices. Results should be ranked by relevance.

steps: Go to the homepage ("Page 3 E-Commerce HomePage")
Click on a category (e.g., "Men" or "Women") in the sidebar menu
expectedResult: Should see products relevant to the selected category with images, names, and prices. Results should be paginated for large result sets.

steps: Go to the homepage ("Page 3 E-Commerce HomePage")
Enter an invalid keyword (e.g., "asdfghjkl") in the search bar
Press Enter or click on the magnifying glass icon
Go to the homepage ("Page 3 E-Commerce HomePage")
Find and select a product with available inventory
Click on "Add to Cart"
expectedResult: Should see a confirmation message, updated cart summary (e.g., number of items in the cart), and the product added to the cart page ("Page 5 Cart")

testCase: Add Product to Cart - Out of Stock
steps: Go to the homepage ("Page 3 E-Commerce HomePage")
Find and select a product with out-of-stock inventory
Click on "Add to Cart"
expectedResult: Should see an error message indicating that the product is out of stock

steps: Go to the homepage ("Page 3 E-Commerce HomePage")
Find and select a product with available inventory
Click on "Add to Wishlist"
expectedResult: Should see a confirmation message, and the product should be added to the wishlist page ("Page 4 Wishlist")

steps: Go to the wishlist page ("Page 4 Wishlist")
Find and select a product in the wishlist
Click on "Remove" or use the trash icon next to the product
expectedResult: Should see a confirmation message, and the selected product should be removed from the wishlist

steps: Go to the homepage ("Page 3 E-Commerce HomePage")
Have an empty cart (no items added)
Click on "Proceed to Checkout"
expectedResult: Should see an error message indicating that the cart is empty

steps: Add products to the cart and proceed to checkout ("Page 6 CheckOut")
Leave the email field blank (guest user)
expectedResult: Should be prompted to login/register as a guest user

steps: Go through the entire checkout process with valid billing, shipping, and payment information
Click on "Place Your Order"
expectedResult: Should see a confirmation message, order number, receipt details, and a successful transaction record

steps: Go to the homepage ("Page 3 E-Commerce HomePage")
Look for featured products with countdown timers and discounted pricing
expectedResult: Should see active flash sale promotions with discounted prices and countdown timers

steps: Go to the homepage ("Page 3 E-Commerce HomePage")
Look for featured products that have an expired promotion (e.g., countdown timer finished)
